name: Vertex Steve
description:
Vertex Steve is a 2D side scrolling shooter where your goal is to reach the WIN marker on each level. In between you and the marker you might find monsters and dragons who will shoot at you.

Keyboard Controls are listed on Main Menu.
Gamepad compatible and recommended.

ALPHA RELEASE - Tested on Windows 10 and Ubuntu 20.04

All bug reports and comments welcome.

I plan on releasing an updated multi world version if there is interest in it.
